// dependencies.@headlessui/react: Headless UI provides a collection of unstyled and accessible React components.
// dependencies.@neshca/cache-handler: This library enables custom caching strategies in Next.js such as a Redis/Valkey-based cache in a multi-instance self-hosted deployment.
// dependencies.clsx: This library constructs conditional class strings.
// dependencies.next: Next.js is a web server framework for React.
// dependencies.react: React is a framework for developing UI components with the JSX syntax.
// dependencies.react-dom: This library renders React components as DOM elements.
// dependencies.tslib: This optimisation library is required by `importHelpers` in `tsconfig.json`.

// devDependencies.@biomejs/biome: Biome is an opinionated linter and code formatter.
// devDependencies.@mswjs/interceptors: This MSW plugin enables Mock Service Worker (MSW) in Node.js for Vitest.
// devDependencies.@storybook/addon-a11y: This Storybook addon runs the Axe linter on stories to reveal accessibility issues.
// devDependencies.@storybook/addon-docs: This Storybook addon enables component documentation.
// devDependencies.@storybook/addon-links: This Storybook addon enables links between stories.
// devDependencies.@storybook/nextjs: This Storybook plugin renders React components in stories, enables PostCSS, and makes Next.js images and fonts compatible with Storybook.
// devDependencies.@storybook/nextjs-vite: This Storybook plugin enables the Vite builder in stories.
// devDependencies.@tailwindcss/typography: This Tailwind CSS plugin provides the `prose` class to style HTML documents dynamically.
// devDependencies.@types/node: These type definitions cover Node.js modules.
// devDependencies.@vitest/coverage-v8: This Vitest plugin reports code coverage.
// devDependencies.@vitest/ui: This Vitest plugin provides a test overview in the web browser.
// devDependencies.autoprefixer: This PostCSS plugin adds browser vendor prefixes to CSS rules. It is a peer dependency of `tailwindcss`.
// devDependencies.client-only: This library provides a safeguard to prevent server-side code from importing client-only code. It is complemented by `server-only`.
// devDependencies.jest-extended: This Vitest plugin provides additional matchers for developer convenience.
// devDependencies.lefthook: Lefthook is a Git hooks manager.
// devDependencies.msw: Mock Service Worker (MSW) mocks the HTTP Fetch API to inject fake API responses in automated test suites.
// devDependencies.postcss: PostCSS is a CSS processing tool. It is a peer dependency of `tailwindcss`.
// devDependencies.postcss-pseudo-classes: This PostCSS plugin extracts CSS rules with pseudo-class selectors (e.g. `:focus` and `:hover`) into separate classes that can be applied regardless of the actual state.
// devDependencies.server-only: This library provides a safeguard to prevent client-side code from importing server-only code. It is complemented by `client-only`.
// devDependencies.storybook: Storybook is a development environment for viewing and testing UI components in isolation.
// devDependencies.svgo: SVGO is an SVG optimisation tool.
// devDependencies.tailwindcss: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework.
// devDependencies.typescript: TypeScript is a statically typed programming language on top of JavaScript.
// devDependencies.vitest: Vitest is a unit testing framework.
